name: Congressionally Directed Assistance
objective: To implement Congressionally directed assistance for the purposes identified in the Department of Defense (“DoD”) annual appropriations act.  The resulting assistance instruments support a variety of Congressional priorities.  DoD awards the appropriate assistance instruments for the Congressionally identified purposes consistent with its authority, including applicable requirements for merit-based or competitive processes.
